messages.title: Standing up for the NHS
messages.content: We urgently need additional investment in frontline services...

messages.title: Fighting against Hard Brexit
messages.content: Tories have admitted that post Brexit there will be no reduction in immigration...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: £31 million more for the NHS and Social Care in Bolton
£770 more for pensioners by protecting the triple-lock
Reversing cuts of £19 million to schools throughout Bolton

issues.brexitEurope: Fighting against Hard Brexit...Many people feel that they should have a vote on the final deal.
issues.education: Opposing school cuts...schools...are set to lose £19 million...
issues.health: Standing up for the NHS...an additional £6 billion...reversing numerous planned closures of surgeries and A&E departments...and securing more staff...
issues.immigration: Fighting against Hard Brexit...there will be no reduction in immigration as a result...

housing.content: Many people in Bolton South East have told me of their deep dissatisfaction with the Tory Government...with lack of funding for the NHS, education and housing.

leaflet.personalStatement: My main focus for this election is the protection of the NHS...

contactInformation.address: Please return to Elliott Bermudez-Galton at 69 Grosvenor Street, Kearsley, Bolton BL4 8DP

images.caption: Frank Harasiwka for genuine change in BOLTON SOUTH EAST
